languages.text: "Ты совсем не понял{mf||а} суть плетения, элантах. И это... естественно. Лучше тебе проводить время со своими собратьями, чем пытаться познать то, на что у Азуриани уходят столетия".

"You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."
languages.original_text: "Ты совсем не понял{mf||а} суть плетения, элантах. И это... естественно. Лучше тебе проводить время со своими собратьями, чем пытаться познать то, на что у Азуриани уходят столетия".

traits.locale_text: "You have completely misunderstood the purpose of weaving, elantach. It is... only natural. You should spend time with your kinspeople rather than try to grasp something that takes an Asuryani centuries to learn."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have completely misunderstood the purpose of weaving, elantach. It is... only natural. You should spend time with your kinspeople rather than try to grasp something that takes an Asuryani centuries to learn."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."

traits.locale_text: "You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Il est évident que vous ne comprenez pas du tout le but de cette coutume, elantach, mais je m'y attendais. Vous devriez passer plus de temps parmi les vôtres au lieu d'essayer d'apprendre quelque chose qu'un Asuryani ne peut maîtriser qu'au bout de plusieurs siècles de pratique. »
languages.original_text: "You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."

traits.locale_text: « Il est évident que vous ne comprenez pas du tout le but de cette coutume, elantach, mais je m'y attendais. Vous devriez passer plus de temps parmi les vôtres au lieu d'essayer d'apprendre quelque chose qu'un Asuryani ne peut maîtriser qu'au bout de plusieurs siècles de pratique. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Has malinterpretado por completo el propósito de esta costumbre, elantach. Pero era de esperar. Deberías pasar más tiempo entre los tuyos en lugar de intentar aprender algo que los Asuryani tardamos siglos en dominar».
languages.original_text: "You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."

traits.locale_text: «Has malinterpretado por completo el propósito de esta costumbre, elantach. Pero era de esperar. Deberías pasar más tiempo entre los tuyos en lugar de intentar aprender algo que los Asuryani tardamos siglos en dominar».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你从根本上误解了我们这种习俗的目的，外界人，不过这也算是在意料之中。你应该多花些时间和你自己的族人呆在一起，而不是学习方舟灵族要花上几百年才能掌握的东西。”
languages.original_text: "You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."

traits.locale_text: “你从根本上误解了我们这种习俗的目的，外界人，不过这也算是在意料之中。你应该多花些时间和你自己的族人呆在一起，而不是学习方舟灵族要花上几百年才能掌握的东西。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、お前はこの習慣の目的を誤解しているようだ。だが、それは予測通りだ。アシュリヤーニが取得するのに何年もかかるような事をするのではなく、もっと自分たちの民族と時間を過ごすべきなんだ」
languages.original_text: "You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、お前はこの習慣の目的を誤解しているようだ。だが、それは予測通りだ。アシュリヤーニが取得するのに何年もかかるような事をするのではなく、もっと自分たちの民族と時間を過ごすべきなんだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt den Zweck dieser Tradition von Grund auf missverstanden, Elantach. Doch das ist nicht anders zu erwarten. Verbringt lieber mehr Zeit unter Euresgleichen, statt etwas lernen zu wollen, was ein Asuryani erst nach Jahrhunderten meistert."
languages.original_text: "You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt den Zweck dieser Tradition von Grund auf missverstanden, Elantach. Doch das ist nicht anders zu erwarten. Verbringt lieber mehr Zeit unter Euresgleichen, statt etwas lernen zu wollen, was ein Asuryani erst nach Jahrhunderten meistert."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bu geleneğin amacını temelden yanlış anladın elantach. Bu durum beklenmedik değil. Asuryani'nin ustalaşmak için yüzyıllar harcadığı bir şeyi öğrenmeye çalışmak yerine kendi halkının arasında daha fazla zaman geçirmelisin."
languages.original_text: "You have fundamentally misunderstood the purpose of this custom, elantach. But that is to be expected. You should spend more time among your own people instead of trying to learn something that takes an Asuryani centuries to master."
